    • Method Detail

      • detectFaces

        public static org.json.JSONArray detectFaces(java.lang.String imagePath)
        Detect human faces in an image and returns face locations, and optionally with faceIds, landmarks, and attributes. Optional parameters for returning faceId, landmarks, and attributes. Attributes include age, gender, smile intensity, facial hair, head pose, glasses, emotion, hair, makeup, occlusion, accessories, blur, exposure and noise. faceId is for other APIs use including Face - Identify, Face - Verify, and Face - Find Similar. The faceId will expire 24 hours after detection call.
        Parameters:
        imagePath - - The path of the image to detect
        Returns:
        A successful call returns an array of face entries ranked by face rectangle size in descending order. An empty response indicates no faces detected.

      • identifyFaces

        public static org.json.JSONArray identifyFaces(java.lang.String[] faceIds,
                                               int maxNumOfCandidatesReturned,
                                               double confidenceThreshold)
        Identify unknown faces from a person group. For each face in the faceIds array, Face Identify will compute similarities between the query face and all the faces in the person group (given by personGroupId), and returns candidate person(s) for that face ranked by similarity confidence. The person group should be trained to make it ready for identification.
        Parameters:
        faceIds - - Array of query faces faceIds, created by the Face - Detect. Each of the faces are identified independently. The valid number of faceIds is between [1, 10]
        maxNumOfCandidatesReturned - - The range of maxNumOfCandidatesReturned is between 1 and 5 (default is 1)
        confidenceThreshold - - Confidence threshold of identification, used to judge whether one face belong to one person. The range of confidenceThreshold is [0, 1]
        Returns:
        A successful call returns the identified candidate person(s) for each query face.
